revised_title: John Macnaghten Whittaker: A Pioneering Mathematician
tldr: John Macnaghten Whittaker was a prominent mathematician known for his work in complex analysis and mathematical theory. He introduced the concept of the lower order of an entire function and made significant contributions to the fields of analysis, asymptotic periods, and polynomial expansions. Whittaker's work has had a lasting impact on mathematics and his life is celebrated through his numerous achievements and contributions to the field.
